definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: It was time to write down and acknowledge that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 這是記下和承認它已經離去這一事實的時候。

sentences.english: But just as quickly as new members come, they also go.
sentences.chinese: 隨着新成員的加入，老隊員也很快離去。

sentences.english: The dog went of and quested.
sentences.chinese: 只狗離去而開始進行跟蹤搜尋了。

sentences.english: Collect leave, younger sister of your Cheng Yi does not have face very much, step down a stage in anger.
sentences.chinese: 羅的離去，令程伊妹很沒面子，憤然走下臺去。

sentences.english: I count the time you have left me, every minute , every second .
sentences.chinese: 我一分種，一秒鐘地計算你離去嘚時間。

sentences.english: When proper guest is driven, chef and lackey leave suddenly however.
sentences.chinese: 正當客人駕到時，廚師和僕人卻突然離去。

sentences.english: RenShun crying to be good English explanation, but good English coldly leave.
sentences.chinese: 仁順哭着向善英解釋，但是善英冷冷地離去。

sentences.english: News of this middle-aged man's sudden passing nearly broke the Web.
sentences.chinese: 這個中年男人的突然離去讓整個網絡世界炸開了鍋。

sentences.english: her mother died and her father followed.
sentences.chinese: 母親辭世後不久，父親也緊隨其後，悄然離去。

sentences.english: If I passed away quietly someday, please bury me in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 如果有一天，我悄然離去，請把我埋在這春天裏。

sentences.english: Shu Nian's leaving is an everlasting pain in Xie Yan, a wound that does not heal .
sentences.chinese: 舒唸的離去是謝炎永遠的痛，一個無法癒合的傷口。

sentences.english: She's out of the country on a business trip , and Ken Olshan, the agency's worldwide chairman, officially denies she's leaving.
sentences.chinese: 該公司全球業務總裁奧爾尚正式否認她將離去。

sentences.english: I leave that moment, that twilight of the background on my mind occupied.
sentences.chinese: 我在離去那刻，那風燭殘年的背景就在我腦海佔據了。

sentences.english: He got off at XiNing, while we kept moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 火車到達西寧，他離去，我們則繼續我們的前行。

sentences.english: But when she went, she took everything.
sentences.chinese: 但當她離去人寰，她帶走了一切。

definition: (of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
to turn round/to turn one's head/later/by and by
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to become aware/to detect/to realize/to perceive
